name: cf7-custom-validation-messages
description: WordPress plugin that extends Contact Form 7 by adding custom validation messages for each field
author: Your Name

scripts.build: npm run prebuild && npm run zip
scripts.release: npm run build && echo 'Release package created in dist/ folder'
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run update-plugin-version
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm run update-plugin-version
scripts.bump:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm run update-plugin-version
scripts.dev: echo 'Development mode - no build needed for this plugin'
